A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible\, just terrible. Worse than the prequels. All of the prequels had moments that make them watchable and even re-watchable to some extent. I have no interest in seeing the movie again. It was horribly silly at times\, the film was too long and disjointed.  I understand the desire to make an original film and to move away from the same formula as the prior films. You can do that and still make a Star Wars movie. This was not a Star Wars movie.
